meanings.definition: To groom oneself excessively in order to appear superior to others.
meanings.sent1: The peacock was outpreening its feathers before the other birds.
meanings.sent2: She spent hours outpreening in front of the mirror before the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat was outpreening itself, thinking it was the most elegant creature in the room.
meanings.sent4: The model was outpreening on the runway, showing off her beauty to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The actor was outpreening for the cameras, trying to look perfect from every angle.

meanings.definition: To boast or brag excessively about one's accomplishments or qualities.
meanings.sent1: He couldn't stop outpreening about his new promotion at work.
meanings.sent2: She was outpreening about her cooking skills to anyone who would listen.
meanings.sent3: The little boy was outpreening to his friends about his high score in the game.
meanings.sent4: The politician was outpreening about his achievements during the campaign.
meanings.sent5: The student was outpreening about her grades, thinking she was the smartest in the class.
